item.title: Low hanging brambles and hedges, 21st October
item.description:
There are low hanging brambles and hedges running along lobleys drive affecting walkers please can these be cut back asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
